title: Positive Statement
content: You are a student, [aren't you|are you]?
explanationZhTw: 肯定句 -> 否定附加問句。
explanationZhCn: 肯定句 -> 否定附加问句。

title: Negative Statement
explanationZhTw: 否定句 -> 肯定附加問句。
explanationZhCn: 否定句 -> 肯定附加问句。

title: I am Exception
content: I am late, [aren't I|am not I]?
explanationEnUs: 'Aren't I' is the standard tag for 'I am'.
explanationZhTw: 'Aren't I' 是 'I am' 的標準附加問句。
explanationZhCn: 'Aren't I' 是 'I am' 的标准附加问句。

title: Imperative
explanationEnUs: Tag for imperatives is usually 'will you'.
explanationZhTw: 祈使句的附加問句通常是 'will you'。
explanationZhCn: 祈使句的附加问句通常是 'will you'。

title: Indefinite Pronouns
explanationEnUs: 'Nothing' is negative, so tag is positive 'did it'.
explanationZhTw: 'Nothing' 是否定，所以附加問句用肯定 'did it'。
explanationZhCn: 'Nothing' 是否定，所以附加问句用肯定 'did it'。

title: There is/are
content: There is a problem, [isn't there|is there]?

title: Negative Adverbs
explanationEnUs: 'Never' makes the sentence negative, so tag is positive.
explanationZhTw: 'Never' 使句子變成否定，所以附加問句用肯定。
explanationZhCn: 'Never' 使句子变成否定，所以附加问句用肯定。

title: Complex Sentence
content: He thinks you are right, [doesn't he|aren't you]?
explanationEnUs: Tag usually follows the main clause (He thinks).
explanationZhTw: 附加問句通常跟隨主要子句 (He thinks)。
explanationZhCn: 附加问句通常跟随主要子句 (He thinks)。
